name: Freak. When? See! (or A Gigantic Odyssey to Find Apollo 18)
name_original: Freak. When? See! (or A Gigantic Odyssey to Find Apollo 18)
description: Created for Global Game Jam 17's theme of "waves", it's A Gigantic Odyssey to Find Apollo 18! (Originally titled "Freak. When? See!") A loving homage to the music of They Might Be Giants, you guide Particle Man through space, creating the waves that make up the universe. Avoid the freaks of nature that enter your path.
